## Compliance checklist

- [ ] Changes are limited to `BYLAWS.md` (and `CHANGELOG.md`, if applicable)
- [ ] Version number in `BYLAWS.md` has been incremented correctly
- [ ] Amendment is atomic (one amendment, one PR)
- [ ] No history rewriting (rebase/squash) requested or performed
- [ ] This PR follows the workflow defined in `GOVERNANCE.md`
